install.name: Commission Calculator - Pound
install.author: Noxidsoft - Noel Dixon
install.description: Commission Calculator - Pound! A Joomla 1.5 module that works out a commission based on percentages of a sale price!

param.name: salePriceLabel
param.label: Sale Price Label
param.description: Enter a discriptive label for the Sale Price input box!

param.name: commissionLabel
param.label: Commission Label
param.description: Enter a discriptive label for the Commission input box!

param.name: labelPosition
param.label: Label Position
param.description: Choose the label position in respect to the input fields!

param.name: percentOfAmount
param.label: Percent (%) up to Amount
param.description: Use a real number i.e. 10, 15.6, etc, for the percentage (%) which will be applied to the set Amount (£) in the next parameter!

param.name: amount
param.label: Amount (£)
param.description: Enter a decimal Amount (£) i.e. 18000.00 or 18000! The first percentage amount will be applied to this parameter only! A user may enter a larger or lesser amount to this, but calculations will act appropriately!

param.name: percentOfEverythingAfterAmount
param.label: Percent (%) after Amount
param.description: Use a real number i.e. 10, 15.6, etc, for the percentage (%) which will be applied to the remaining amount if the user enters an amount greater than the set Amount (£) in the second parameter!

param.name: taxation
param.label: Percent (%) of Tax
param.description: Use a real number i.e. 10, 15.6, etc, for the percentage (%) which will be applied to the final amount!
